snippet: As the Senate opens debate, the gun lobby is waiting with several killer amendments.
abstract: Editorial applauds Senate vote to break conservative filibuster to allow debate on bill to expand background checks for most gun sales; notes bill's supporters are most worried about amendments that Republicans, backed by gun lobby, will attempt to offer that pose real threat, and make bill completely ineffective.
lead_paragraph: As the Senate opens debate, the gun lobby is waiting with several killer amendments.

headline.seo: The Rugged Road for Gun Control
headline.main: The Rugged Road for Gun Control
headline.print_headline: The Rugged Road for Gun Control
